Hi, I’m Melissa Keizer — I’m a product designer focussed on creating meaningful experiences that move the needle.

I have spent the last decade working across the whole design spectrum including user research, UI/UX design and front-end development. I’m also an avid photographer and visual story teller, specialising in capturing our favourite, furry companions.

Design Work

Find some of my design work with case study notes on my Dribbble profile.

Photography

I post photo stories and galleries of my trips away and pet photoshoots.

Twitter

Catch my ramblings and get in touch by sliding into my DMs.

Designer & Photographer, Melissa Keizer
